pages.text: The compass is used in conjunction with the maid's home mode. Right-clicking on a block records the coordinates, then right-clicking the maid can set coordinates for it.

Compass has 4 modes:$(br)$(li)Single point: The maid will move within 16 block within the set coordinates.$(li)Multi-point reentry: The maid will move back and forth along the set coordinates.$(li)Multi-point closure: The maid will move cyclically along the set coordinates.$(li)Set range: The maid will only move within the setting range.
